review: I have been using the Fire TV stick for several weeks and so far it has been working very well. I am using it only for Prime Video services and it works seamlessly. It was also very easy to set up. I am very happy with my purchase.
author: White Rabbit

review: Great product, great compliment to Netflix. Extremely satisfied!
author: Zach

review: Very simple to set up.  Works great!
author: Modawg

review: Love it.  Unplug Chromecast, insert Fire TV Stick.  Any questions?
author: MattMurdock

review: I have a couple issues with this device. It drops my wifi connection periodically and the signal strength should be excellent as the router is very close. Also it doesn't have the kids app "Free time" on it like my fire tv does. Since I bought this for my daughters room, that was really what I thought to be a buying feature and since it was on the fire tv and our kindle I thought for sure it would be on the stick. She got very familiar with how to navigate through free time on the fire tv and kinde so this has been a pain for her to try to use, and a pain for me to have to keep tring to teach her how to navigate the menus to find kid friendly programming.
author: Drebeesie

review: Slow processing speed. Interface and app selection are good, but streaming apps, such as live games on MLB, are constantly buffering with wifi. Might work better when plugged directly into internet router.
author: EHank8

review: Glad I bought this an basically made my tv into a smart tv
author: Robert j Molloy III

review: Best item ever purchased. Never knew I needed this product until we received it. Does everything as promised.
author: DebPickRamsey
